markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fiend's Door](/Feats.aspx?ID=1392) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 41 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety. Once per day, you can cast [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) as a 5th-level divine innate spell.
name: Fiend's Door
